channel.title: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!" - Link to official thread inside!

item.title: Re: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!
item.content:encoded: Er, you're allowed to have people from your alt's villages hop over to the contest one but you can't take things out of the storehouse. or have things sent to you. Those two capabilities are banned from your contest character, and you won't be able to do it if you tried.

item.title: Re: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!
item.content:encoded: Wait someone said i was allowed to make another alt? Is this true or not? Oh and if i lose the challenge what happens to the alt? If i get to keep it im in. I mean it cant hurt. Also would i be allowed to get people from any of my 3 village's? Or is that not alllowed. If it is ill have 50 easy. So if i have my friend take the 8 puppets in the store house and give them to me would that be allowed? Or no? And i still dont know if im allowed to havee him in another village at any point.

item.title: Re: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!
item.content:encoded: from my understanding, ryo is made in any way as long as it doesnt come from your alts. other peoples alts are ok tho.

item.title: Re: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!
item.content:encoded: Yeh i saw. Well im out anyway. I have 3 alts. I would take a shot at it, but cant. Darn taxi that is a harsh contest. I do want the +100 stam. That would help. But since all my alts each have +100stam by themselves, guess it wouldn't make much difference. Oh and taxi can that character be in any other village's? Is there a way he needs to make the Ryo?

item.title: Re: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!
item.content:encoded: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge page is up.

item.title: Re: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!
item.content:encoded: Um taxi can you like tell me what its about cause i cant access random as you know. im banned.

item.title: EvilTaxi's Great BvS Challenge!
item.content:encoded:
http://z3.invisionfree.com/Random_Village/index.php?showtopic=1854

If someone could write up a Wiki article, that'd be great. :)
